title: Fairy Glowstick
info: The Fairy Glowstick is a type of Glowstick sold by the Zoologist for 75 when all three fairies have been recorded in the Bestiary. The Fairy Glowstick functions like a regular Glowstick when thrown, however, when it collides with a block, it will hover above it at a certain height.
stat:
Use time15 (Very fast)
Velocity6
TooltipHovers when thrown
Works when wet
Rarity01*
Buy75
Sell15
Research100 required
